content: make your own 3d hearts with this crochet pattern final size * about 3 5 in 9 cm tall if you use worsted weight yarn and a 4 0 mm crochet hook * about 2 7 in 7 cm tall if you use sport weight yarn and a 3 0 mm crochet hook * about 2 3 in 6 cm tall if you use sport weight yarn and a 2 5 mm crochet hook for this pattern you need to have basic crochet and amigurumi skills and to know how to read crochet patterns you need to know the following crochet terms magic_ring magic_ring uk=magic_ring single_crochet single_crochet uk=double_crochet increase single_crochet increase in single_crochet uk=increase in double_crochet decrease single_crochet decrease in single_crochet uk=decrease in double_crochet fo fasten_off uk=fasten_off supplies - red magenta or pink yarn see final size to see what type of yarn and hook to use - crochet hook - yarn needle - stitch markers - scissors - stuffing material of your choice
